sentence: Unfortunately, we are living in desperate times and the only way that Cheney and Kinzinger can survive is to do the right thing and bring criminal charges to light about the complicity and the possible conspiracy by Republicans like Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley, Louie Gohmert, Mo Brooks, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Lauren Boebert, Matt Gaetz, Paul Gosar, and others, to overturn our democratically elected 46th President.
title: Rep. Adam Kinzinger brings a bazooka to Josh Hawley's knife fight

sentence: Other GOP members have also previously spoken out against a potential U.S. military intervention over the Russia-Ukraine situation, including Congressmen Paul Gosar and Thomas Massie of Arizona and Kentucky respectively.
author: Adam Staten
title: Kinzinger Blasts Josh Hawley for Urging Biden to Drop Support to Ukraine

sentence: "Nor was there even the slightest suggestion that perhaps the party should distance itself from the bizarre bigoted rantings of [Marjorie Taylor Greene] (R-GA), or Paul Gosar (R-AZ), or Lauren Boebert (R-CO), or Madison Cawthorn (R-NC)," he wrote.
author: Bob Brigham
title: RNC has ‘gone all-in on the insurrection’ while excusing ‘bigoted rantings’: Charlie Sykes

sentence: A big part of this play is that Kinzinger, along with neo-conservatives like Rep. Liz Cheney, are battling to regain control over a political party now inundated with more flagrantly corrupt, more flagrantly authoritarian, and more flagrantly incompetent officials like Sen. Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
title: Adam Kinzinger has a lot to say: Donald Trump ‘is the worst president the U.S. ever had’

sentence: Those are the acceptable sins, respectively, of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, Lauren Boebart, Matt Gaetz, and Paul Gosar.
author: Wajahat Ali
title: Sorry, Mitch McConnell. Frankenstein’s Monster Runs the GOP Now

sentence: Nine other candidates are in the race, but the only one with significant resources is another veteran, Jonathan Hullihan, who touts the backing of far-right Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ).
author: Sam Brodey
title: The Drama in This Crazy Texas Primary Explains Trump’s GOP

sentence: Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) said that the Republican Party, and leaders like Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) now answer to people like Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Lauren Boebert (R-CO).
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Adam Kinzinger trashes Kevin McCarthy: He's beholden to Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar

sentence: Cheney commented that as “Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: Caleb Newton
title: Kinzinger Hits Marjorie Greene For Headlining White Supremacist Event

sentence: Another Republican who herself has faced censure by the national Republican Party for her participation in the January 6 investigation, Liz Cheney, also aimed fire at Ms Greene: “As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: John Bowden
title: Romney calls Marjorie Taylor Greene a ‘moron’ as moderates demand party ditch ‘Putin wing of GOP’

sentence: The comment from Romney follows criticism from Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney, a Republican, of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona for speaking at the America First Political Action Conference that took place in Orlando, Florida and was organized by White nationalist Nick Fuentes.
author: Chandelis Duster
title: 'I've got morons on my team': Romney blasts fellow GOP members for attending White nationalist event and supporting Putin

sentence: In a tweet Saturday, Rep. Liz Cheney, who has faced intraparty censure in her home state of Wyoming over her criticism of former President Donald Trump, blasted their speaking appearance: “As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: Mike Murphy
title: ‘Morons’: Romney, Cheney, Kinzinger condemn fellow Republicans for speaking at white nationalist event

sentence: McCarthy on Monday called the America First Political Action Conference “appalling” and said “there’s no place in our party for any of this,” but on Tuesday he declined to say whether House Republicans would sanction Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) or Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) for participating, though he said he would have a talk with them.
author: Igor Bobic
title: Kevin McCarthy Dodges On Punishing Members Over White Nationalist Conference

sentence: This shift has manifested in a strident public embrace of far-right authoritarianism, most recently when Trumpist Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona spoke at a pro-Vladimir Putin event hosted and funded by prominent white nationalist Nick Fuentes.
author: Max Burns
title: Ukraine-Russia war overshadows State of the Union. Whatever Biden says, it's not strong.

sentence: On one side you have the Trump/MAGA/tea party wing of the GOP, filled with detestable folks like Reps. Lauren Boebert, Matt Gaetz, Madison Cawthorn, Paul Gosar, and Marjorie Taylor Greene.
title: War in the GOP: Have Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar made one too many mistakes?

sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar was one of three members of the House of Representatives on Wednesday to vote against a symbolic measure calling for a cease-fire in Ukraine and support for its people.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Rep. Paul Gosar is 1 of 3 to vote against pro-Ukraine measure

sentence: Although the resolution passed by an overwhelming majority, three House Republicans voted against it: Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Thomas Massie (R-KY), and Matt Rosendale (R-MT).
author: Brad Reed
title: 'Unreal': Adam Kinzinger slams three GOP colleagues who voted against resolution supporting Ukrainian people

sentence: Out of 429 voting members, three lawmakers -- all Republicans -- voted against affirming the resolution on Wednesday: Reps. Paul Gosar of Arizona, Thomas Massie of Kentucky and Matt Rosendale of Montana.
author: Calley Hair
title: U.S. House passes resolution declaring support for Ukraine

sentence: One of the three Republicans in question, Rep. Paul Gosar, delivered a clapback to Rep. Kinzinger that reiterated his America first stance.

title: Rep Gosar Owns RINO Kinzinger For Crying On Twitter Over Ukraine Support Resolution Vote Differences

title: Disgust abounds after three House Republicans vote no on resolution supporting Ukraine

sentence: The Senate has also censured nine of its own members, and in 2021, the U.S. House of Representatives censured its 24th member, Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona, for, among other things, posting an anime video of himself killing a fellow member.
author: Seth Masket
title: How An Uptick In Censures Among Local Republicans Signals A Growing Radicalism

sentence: +6 View gallery A spokesperson for Republican Rep. Liz Cheney slammed the House's GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy for endorsing Cheney's primary challenger instead of condemning the right-wing members of his party +6 View gallery Cheney shared Adler's statement in a tweet and linked it to the CNN story it appeared in that called McCarthy's endorsement of Harriet Hageman, Cheney's Trump-backed GOP challenger, a 'special case' The story notes that McCarthy has backed only one primary challenger ahead of the 2022 midterms - that of Cheney's - and not anyone trying to take out controversial Republican members including Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene or Paul Gosar.
author: Nikki Schwab
title: Cheney knocks McCarthy for backing her rival but not those of 'pro-Putin' lawmakers

sentence: By contrast, Democrats have utterly failed to elevate the profiles of sinister figures like Reps. Paul Gosar, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Madison Cawthorn or Lauren Boebert.
author: Mona Charen
title: Democrats need to get better at politics, fast

sentence: By contrast, Democrats have utterly failed to elevate the profiles of sinister figures like Reps. Paul Gosar, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Madison Cawthorn or Lauren Boebert.
